title: Full Shooting Scene from "American Horror Story: Cult" 7x06
author: AHS Leaks
comment: Is America's reality, no reason to edit the scene.
This was mild compared to what AHS is used to.
omg i couldnt imagine worse/better timing to have a scene like this

This shooting takes a whole new perspective at the end of the episode. One of the most chilling moments is the expression on meadow’s face when she says “this is the face of true love...” I’ll never forget that scene.
Fun fact: this scene was filmed walking distance from the place briarcliff was filmed from season 2 (and you can visit both of these places) :)
description:
The unedited version of the shooting scene from American Horror Story: Cult 7x06 "Mid-Western Assassin"
